name: ROGUE BULLET
description:
ROGUE BULLET was made in 2 days as a quick break from some longer-term projects.

It is a fast-fusion of the turn-based movement from traditional rogue games, combined with the real-time, shoot 'em up combat found in more modern top down 'roguelite' shooters.

All the rooms are randomly generated using a custom algorithm™. There are also 3 distinct enemy types and 3 distinct weapons - so hopefully this should keep you occupied for at least 5 minutes...

I would love any feedback you have to offer. Also following me and sharing this with people you think would enjoy it would help me out massively! I will slowly but surely keep producing better and better content as and when I can find the time.

Follow me on twitter: https://twitter.com/madbookstudios

Subscribe to my Youtube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_vCpox5w2ZXvh8fshC0_hA

Link to website: https://www.madbookstudios.com/

Free music used in this mini-project:

"Exit the Premises" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
